scenario_text.value: (Huh? Over there, that’s... Aoi and Ryo?!)

(Can’t say I expected to see those two
together... What’re they doing, I wonder?)
That’s all the peeling. This good?
Thanks. Let’s see...

Nice. Good job. Who’d’ve thought you had it
in you?
It ain’t nothing... I’m used to it.
Oh? What’re you doing there, Takuma?
Huh? Takuma?
Getting your jollies spying on us, man?

Oh, my bad. It isn’t like that, I was just
surprised to see the two of you together.

Hehe, you’re telling me. Ryo came and
volunteered to help.

I was bored outta my skull over here. There
a problem with that?

Not in the least. You’ve been a big help, in
fact.

Ryo’s pretty awesome, you know? He peeled
those veggies like a pro!

Is that right? Maybe we’ve got a secret iron
chef over here?
Well... Had to do it in my mom’s place.
Oh, that makes sense.

But who cares about all that! If that’s all
you got for me, I’m out.

Oh, could you wash the rice? Then boil it,
and prep the meat for cooking.

Sheesh, you want me to build the dinner
table, too? Fine, fine, I’m on it.

(Even Ryo’s trying to do his part for this
group. It’s kind of a relief to see it.)

Anyway, you should take off that ring if
you’re gonna cook.

Oh? Ah, yes you’re right. I’d forgotten I had
it on.

(Aoi was wearing a ring? I never even
noticed.)

(Ryo really notices the little things about
the people he talks to.)
(Well, which of them should I talk to?)
I’ll talk to Aoi.
I’ll talk to Ryo.

So you had a ring on, Aoi. I hadn’t even
noticed.

Oh no, it’s not an all-the-time thing. I just
happened to forget to take it off this time.
Oooh, it’s so shiny!
She looks at it a lot before she goes to bed.

Hey, Labramon! Don’t tell them that, it’s
embarrassing!
Is it important to you or something?

Oh no, nothing like that. It’s not special,
a dime-a-dozen trinket you can get anywhere.

This is no time for silly fashion stuff, but
looking at something cute lifts my spirits.

Ah okay... I didn’t expect that, but nothing
wrong with it. It suits you, even.
Hehe, thanks, Takuma.

Very perceptive, Ryo. I didn’t even notice
she was wearing a ring.

Naw, it’s just a coincidence. My eye went to
it while I was helping out.

Looked like something special to her, so
I wasn’t sure what I should say...

Oh no, it’s nothing like that. It’s just
a little trinket.
That right?

Still, for you to worry about that is really
considerate of you.
The heck you think I am, man?

I mean, she ain’t the only one with something
like that.
What, like...some bling?
Hell naw. I mean my bus pass holder.
Your what...?
Kewkew...?

Um... Think of it like a protective charm,
I guess?
Not quite but... Ah well, good enough.

I got it from my mom, y’see. Wherever I go,
you better believe it goes too.
That right? Gotta take care of it, then.

Oh, right. You’re really planning on heading
to the enemy base, Takuma?
Still not sure, to be honest...
I’m guessing you two are against the idea?
Hmm... I wouldn’t say I’m against it, per se.

I’ll go, if there’s truly no safer
alternative.
My thoughts exactly. It’s just...

When I think about running into Arukenimon
again, I just start freaking out...
Yeah... I get how you two feel.
(I wish there was a safer way, but...)
Hey, is that a ring, Aoi?

Oh, um, yes. I brought it with me, thinking
I might feel like dressing up sometimes...
Oooh, it’s so shiny!
She looks at it a lot before she goes to bed.

Hey, Labramon! Don’t tell them that, it’s
embarrassing!
Is it important to you or something?

Oh no, nothing like that. It’s not special,
a dime-a-dozen trinket you can get anywhere.

This is no time for silly fashion stuff, but
looking at something cute lifts my spirits.
It lifts your spirits?

Yes, didn’t you know? Pretty things give
girls power.
Or not, hee hee.

(I’ve never seen Aoi talking about cute
things or dressing up before.)

(I always saw her as calm and mature, but
she’s still a girl at heart.)
(When I see her like this, it’s...)
Unexpected!
Refreshing.
Cute...

I admit, I didn’t expect to see you getting
dolled up for anything.
Ah, well... Saki said something similar.

She was surprised to think see a serious
honor student thinking about accessorizing.
I can tell it doesn’t look good on me...
What?! No! I didn’t mean it like that!

Ah, shame on you, Takuma! Making Aoi feel bad
about it.
I wasn’t, I’m telling you!

It’s unexpected, but that’s not a bad thing!
I’m more impressed than anything!
Impressed...?

Yeah, I mean, going against type like that.
It’s a good look on anybody, y’know?
Huh, so that’s what you mean...

It’s kind of refreshing to see you like this,
Aoi.
Refreshing? How so?

Yeah, you look like you’re enjoying yourself.
I’ve hardly seen you smiling like that.
Yes, I guess you’re right.
Not since we’ve come here, at least...
(Wait, what? Why’s she in a funk now?)
Are you sad, Aoi?
Aoi? You good?
Ah, yes! I’m fine, don’t worry!

There’s so much going on, all the more reason
to lift our spirits with the things we like!
Yeah, uh, sure...
(Did I make her put on a brave face?)
Huh, talk about cute.
What?!
What?

...Oh! No, that’s not what⁠—the ring! Cute!
Cute ring is cute!
Oh, that’s what you meant... I see. *whew*

(Shoot, my brain-to-mouth filter shut off.
Of course that’d would creep her out.)

(Still, seeing her enjoying fashion, smiling
at her ring, Aoi looks pretty...)

(Ah! Pretty nothing! Going down that road’ll
just put me in some pretty hot water.)

(Aw jeez, I can’t even look her in the
eye...)
Ahaha, what a funny face you have, Takuma!
Please, just zip it...
What’s wrong, Aoi? Your face is all red.
It, it’s nothing. Don’t worry about it...

...Takuma? Are you really planning on going
to the enemy base?
Still not sure, to be honest...
Are you against the idea, Aoi?
Hmm... I wouldn’t say I’m against it, per se.

I’m scared of fighting, and I don’t want to
get hurt. Still, if we must, then we must.
I just can’t think of a safer method...

*sigh* But still... All I can do is waffle on
the issue. I’m no good...
(Aoi really is scared.)
(A safer method... I wish there was one.)

All right, ring’s off. Time to get back to
cooking!
Ain’t nothing to get so riled up over...
Aoi! Let me have a closer look at that ring!
Oh, Labramon! Just handle it gently, okay?
